data.actual_result: The selection jumps to where your mouse cursor is
data.expected_result: The selection stays the same and you can press enter to get the right emoji
data.short_description: Wrong emoji get's selected in the Emoji picker when someone sends a message in the same channel
data.steps_to_repro: - write up a beautiful message and attempt to add an emoji in chat via entering `:` and the start of the emoji name - make sure your mouse is hovering over one of the emojis - select a different emoji with the arrow keys - have someone message the channel/dm you are in - observe
